title: Vehicle Accident Procedures
description: Critical steps and communication for handling traffic accidents during service

step1.spanish: DETÉNGASE inmediatamente y asegure la escena
step1.critical: Leaving accident scene is illegal (hit and run) - serious crime
details: If safe, move vehicles to shoulder
Set up warning triangles if you have them
DO NOT LEAVE SCENE until released by police

protocol: Check other vehicle occupants if possible
Do not move seriously injured people unless immediate danger

phrases.english: Are you okay? Are you hurt anywhere?
phrases.pronunciation: es-TAH bee-EN? es-TAH eh-REE-doh en al-GOO-nah PAR-teh

call911if: Other driver wants to leave scene
Passenger in your vehicle (always for gig work)
ANY doubt - better safe than sorry

call911script.english: I need to report a traffic accident at [location]. [Anyone injured? Yes/No]. [Number of vehicles involved]. [Blocking traffic? Yes/No].
call911script.spanish: Necesito reportar un accidente de tráfico en [ubicación]. [¿Alguien herido? Sí/No]. [Número de vehículos involucrados]. [¿Bloqueando tráfico? Sí/No].

step4.importance: CRITICAL - Platform insurance coverage requires immediate notification
howTo: Notify even for minor accidents with passenger
Platform guides you through insurance process

phrases.english: We need to exchange insurance information. Here is my information. May I see your license and insurance card?
phrases.spanish: Necesitamos intercambiar información de seguro. Aquí está mi información. ¿Puedo ver su licencia y tarjeta de seguro?

step5.photograph: Take photos of other driver's license, insurance card, license plate

notes: What you were doing immediately before
Direction of travel for all vehicles

step7.importance: Witnesses can be crucial for insurance claims

phrases.english: Excuse me, did you see what happened? Would you be willing to provide your contact information as a witness?
phrases.spanish: Disculpe, ¿vio lo que pasó? ¿Estaría dispuesto/a a proveer su información de contacto como testigo?

step8.action: Wait for police if they're coming
step8.spanish: Espere a la policía si vienen
step8.policeReport: Police report is crucial for insurance claims. Never leave before police arrive if 911 was called
talking To Police: Don't apologize (can be seen as admission of guilt)
Explain you were working for gig platform with passenger
Request copy of police report for insurance

immediately.english: Are you okay? Are you hurt at all?

afterChecking.english: I'm sorry this happened. I'm calling 911 and my platform immediately. Please stay calm and don't move if you feel any pain.
afterChecking.spanish: Lamento que esto haya pasado. Estoy llamando al 911 y a mi plataforma inmediatamente. Por favor mantenga la calma y no se mueva si siente algún dolor.

reassurance.english: You're covered by the platform's insurance. They will handle all medical costs and any other expenses.
reassurance.spanish: Está cubierto/a por el seguro de la plataforma. Ellos manejarán todos los costos médicos y cualquier otro gasto.
reassurance.pronunciation: es-TAH koo-bee-ER-toh por el seh-GOO-roh deh lah plah-tah-FOR-mah

information.english: I need your contact information for the insurance report. The platform will follow up with you about this incident.
information.spanish: Necesito su información de contacto para el reporte de seguro. La plataforma hará seguimiento con usted sobre este incidente.

uber.withPassenger: $1 million liability coverage while passenger in vehicle

lyft.requirement: Report immediately through app and safety line

doordash.coverage: Varies by situation - auto insurance primary
doordash.requirement: Report immediately, may need your personal insurance

personalInsurance.importance: Platform insurance is supplemental. Maintain your own commercial or rideshare insurance
personalInsurance.rideshareEndorsement: Many insurers offer rideshare endorsement - essential for full coverage
personalInsurance.disclosure: MUST tell your insurance company you do gig work - failure to disclose can void coverage

critical: DO NOT admit fault or apologize excessively
DO NOT agree to handle privately without insurance
DO NOT sign anything except police report
DO NOT let other driver pressure you
DO NOT discuss details on social media
DO NOT fail to report to platform
DO NOT move seriously injured person (unless immediate danger)
DO NOT argue with other driver about fault

toOtherDriver.safe: I'm okay. Are you okay? Let's exchange insurance information and wait for police.
toOtherDriver.spanish: Estoy bien. ¿Está usted bien? Intercambiemos información de seguro y esperemos a la policía.
toOtherDriver.avoid: Don't say 'I'm sorry' or 'It was my fault' - can be used against you

toPolice.safe: I was driving for [platform] with a passenger. The accident happened at [time] when [factual description]. I was following traffic laws.
toPolice.spanish: Estaba conduciendo para [plataforma] con un pasajero. El accidente ocurrió a las [hora] cuando [descripción factual]. Estaba siguiendo las leyes de tráfico.
toPolice.avoid: Don't speculate about cause or fault. Stick to facts you directly observed

toPassenger.safe: The platform's insurance will cover you. They'll contact you. Please provide your information.
toPassenger.spanish: El seguro de la plataforma lo/la cubrirá. Ellos se contactarán con usted. Por favor provea su información.
toPassenger.avoid: Don't promise specific outcomes. Let platform and insurance handle it

immediate: Get checked by doctor even if you feel fine - injuries can appear later
Continue to document any developing symptoms
Follow up with platform insurance adjuster
vehicleRepair: Get estimate from approved repair shop
Platform may provide rental car during repairs
legalProtection: Don't sign releases without understanding them

culturalNotes.note: US law requires staying at accident scene. Leaving is hit and run - serious crime
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Stricter enforcement than Colombian informal accident resolution

culturalNotes.note: US relies on insurance companies for compensation. Always involve insurance, never cash settlements
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More formalized than Colombian direct negotiation culture

culturalNotes.note: Extensive documentation protects everyone. Photos, police reports, and records are essential
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More evidence-based than verbal Colombian agreements

culturalNotes.note: Platform insurance provides significant coverage but requires immediate reporting
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More systematic protection than Colombian informal economy

emergencyContacts.insurance: [Your insurance company number - keep in glove box]
